creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: four large characters on a small sheet of paper, one in each quadrant; signature at far L; red rectangular relief seal URC; and square intaglio seal LLC
markings: URC, rectangular relief seal; LLC, square intaglio seal; on back, ULC, in pencil: [Yamamoto Tokai]
title: Clerical Script Calligraphy
